title: What gives with the multi-kill timers?
body:
A day or 2 ago i was on charge for a quadra-kill, even a double kill is rare for me so exciting stuff. Missed out by several seconds, between the third kill and the fourth.
But then I've just seen a friend get a penta-kill, where the 4th was killed, then exactly 29 seconds later got the 5th and the penta.

So are useless players such as myself not allowed to get multi-kill combos because it will make someone want to kill themselves, or is this a glitch or something? What am I missing here...

replies.body: It's ten seconds between 1/2/3/4 kills, then from a quadra to a penta you have 30 seconds, however if an enemy respawns the time ends and you can no longer get a penta.

> [{quoted}](name=Glow,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=R1gBJQE7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-01T22:54:55.932+0000)
>
> It's ten seconds between 1/2/3/4 kills, then from a quadra to a penta you have 30 seconds, however if an enemy respawns the time ends and you can no longer get a penta.

Correction, if someone spawns while you're on a quadra, you have a minimum of ten seconds to secure the penta, or up until 30 seconds if no one spawns :)

Ok well that makes sense, thanks. I wonder why they made the penta timer longer than the others.

It's basically like conquering 80% of the steps at Niesenlauf, then being handed a ride to the top. Kinda feel like its not an easy thing to do, so should not be handed off so easily once you achieve 80% of the goal?
